meta.reasoning: Successfully completed comprehensive voice system migration from source to target Turborepo. Migrated 6 voice hooks (use-openai-voice-chat, use-voice-navigation, use-elevenlabs-tts, use-livekit-agent, use-voice-copilot-integration, use-voice-chat), voice context (voice-copilot-context), voice components directory (elevenlabs-voice-system, voice-waveform, types), AI elements components (message, conversation, loader, controls), agents-ui components (agent-session-provider, agent-chat-transcript, agent-chat-indicator, agent-disconnect-button), and API routes (voice-search, cedar-voice, pica-voice-search, copilot, elevenlabs-tts, elevenlabs/signed-url). Created unified voice hook architecture supporting multiple providers (livekit, elevenlabs, openai, browser) and ensured compatibility with existing LiveKit/Cortex integration. Added proper TypeScript types for voice-chat and property.
